topics.body:
My neighbors are shouting at their kids again. Hue.


"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5501e858636872459c601600#post_5501e858636872459c601600
Yeah
Also, he lived in the cheapest place he could find: an apartment in an old house that had no heating and a hole in the floor for a toilet.

Also, he befriended this weird poet guy that lived upstairs of him. They became instant friends when he mentioned he was from finland because the dude loved Sibelius.
